title: Gallery | Sights set on Sheffield United
body_text:
Our squad is back training at London Colney after midweek success in the Champions League, ready to take on our next test in the Premier League.
We'll host Sheffield United at Emirates Stadium, looking to continue our unbeaten start to the campaign. The last time we met the Blades was back in 2020 when we ran out 3-0 victors.
Club photographer Stuart MacFarlane was on hand to capture the training ground preparations and you can see all the pictures below in our gallery.
